plot: A short film that poses the question, Does love come in all colors? Sometimes comical, sometimes not, it is a film that begs us to look at how we view other people but mainly at how we view ourselves.
title: The Coloring
plot_es: A short film that poses the question, Does love come in all colors? Sometimes comical, sometimes not, it is a film that begs us to look at how we view other people but mainly at how we view ourselves.
plot_en: A short film that poses the question, Does love come in all colors? Sometimes comical, sometimes not, it is a film that begs us to look at how we view other people but mainly at how we view ourselves.
